root.name: Backyard Football '09
root.description: Pro RosterChamp Bailey Ronde Barber (must be unlocked by achieving 75 tackles in one season)Tom BradyRonnie BrownReggie BushChris CooleyBraylon EdwardsLee EvansLarry Fitzgerald (must be unlocked by achieving 5,000 career receiving yards)Vernon GholstonTony GonzalezFrank GoreA.J. HawkT.J. HoushmandzadehSteven Jackson (must be unlocked by rushing for 1,000 yards in a season)Calvin JohnsonMaurice Jones-DrewRay LewisEli Manning (must be unlocked by throwing 5 touchdown passes in one game)Peyton ManningDarren McFaddenDonovan McNabbAdrian Peterson (must be unlocked by rushing for 5 touchdowns in one game)Ben RoethlisbergerTony Romo (must be unlocked by throwing for 4,000 yards in a single season)Matt RyanSteve Smith (must be unlocked by catching 25 touchdowns in a single season)Lofa Tatupu (must be unlocked by sacking the quarterback 5 times by one player in a single game)Jason TaylorLaDainian TomlinsonBrian UrlacherMario WilliamsVince Young
